utter_chitchat/ask_name.text: Hello, my name is ONF Bot.

utter_faq/enterprise.text: Enterprise forms the root of a customer-specific Enterprise hierarchy. The Enterprise model is referenced by many other objects, and allows those objects to be scoped to a particular Enterprise for ownership and role-based access control purposes.

utter_faq/application.text: Application specifies an application and the endpoints for the application. Applications are the termination point for traffic from the UPF.

utter_faq/vcs.text: Virtual Cellular Service (VCS) connects a Device-Group to an Application.

utter_faq/device_group.text: Device-Group allows multiple devices to be logically grouped together.

utter_faq/site.text: Enterprises are divided into Sites. A site is a point of presence for an Enterprise and may be either physical or logical (i.e. a single geographic location could in theory contain several logical sites).
